alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 5:06AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...The previous advisory had an erroneous issuance time of 10 AM Sunday rather than 10 AM this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
